mapper.select: select lmt_comp_no, cus_id, cert_code, cert_type, cus_name, crd_cont_no, crd_type, amt, input_date, input_time, last_update_date, last_update_time, input_id, input_br_id, lmt_status, field1, field2, field3, field4, field5, field6, field7, field8, field9, field10 from rmp.lmt_comp_info where lmt_comp_no = #{lmtCompNo}

select lmt_comp_no, cus_id, cert_code, cert_type, cus_name, crd_cont_no, crd_type, amt, input_date, input_time, last_update_date, last_update_time, input_id, input_br_id, lmt_status, field1, field2, field3, field4, field5, field6, field7, field8, field9, field10 from rmp.lmt_comp_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into rmp.lmt_comp_info(cus_id, cert_code, cert_type, cus_name, crd_cont_no, crd_type, amt, input_date, input_time, last_update_date, last_update_time, input_id, input_br_id, lmt_status, field1, field2, field3, field4, field5, field6, field7, field8, field9, field10) values (#{cusId}, #{certCode}, #{certType}, #{cusName}, #{crdContNo}, #{crdType}, #{amt}, #{inputDate}, #{inputTime}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{inputId}, #{inputBrId}, #{lmtStatus}, #{field1}, #{field2}, #{field3}, #{field4}, #{field5}, #{field6}, #{field7}, #{field8}, #{field9}, #{field10})

insert into rmp.lmt_comp_info(cus_id, cert_code, cert_type, cus_name, crd_cont_no, crd_type, amt, input_date, input_time, last_update_date, last_update_time, input_id, input_br_id, lmt_status, field1, field2, field3, field4, field5, field6, field7, field8, field9, field10) values
(#{entity.cusId}, #{entity.certCode}, #{entity.certType}, #{entity.cusName}, #{entity.crdContNo}, #{entity.crdType}, #{entity.amt}, #{entity.inputDate}, #{entity.inputTime}, #{entity.lastUpdateDate}, #{entity.lastUpdateTime}, #{entity.inputId}, #{entity.inputBrId}, #{entity.lmtStatus}, #{entity.field1}, #{entity.field2}, #{entity.field3}, #{entity.field4}, #{entity.field5}, #{entity.field6}, #{entity.field7}, #{entity.field8}, #{entity.field9}, #{entity.field10})

insert into rmp.lmt_comp_info(cus_id, cert_code, cert_type, cus_name, crd_cont_no, crd_type, amt, input_date, input_time, last_update_date, last_update_time, input_id, input_br_id, lmt_status, field1, field2, field3, field4, field5, field6, field7, field8, field9, field10) values
(#{entity.cusId}, #{entity.certCode}, #{entity.certType}, #{entity.cusName}, #{entity.crdContNo}, #{entity.crdType}, #{entity.amt}, #{entity.inputDate}, #{entity.inputTime}, #{entity.lastUpdateDate}, #{entity.lastUpdateTime}, #{entity.inputId}, #{entity.inputBrId}, #{entity.lmtStatus}, #{entity.field1}, #{entity.field2}, #{entity.field3}, #{entity.field4}, #{entity.field5}, #{entity.field6}, #{entity.field7}, #{entity.field8}, #{entity.field9}, #{entity.field10})
on duplicate key update cus_id = values(cus_id) , cert_code = values(cert_code) , cert_type = values(cert_type) , cus_name = values(cus_name) , crd_cont_no = values(crd_cont_no) , crd_type = values(crd_type) , amt = values(amt) , input_date = values(input_date) , input_time = values(input_time) , last_update_date = values(last_update_date) , last_update_time = values(last_update_time) , input_id = values(input_id) , input_br_id = values(input_br_id) , lmt_status = values(lmt_status) , field1 = values(field1) , field2 = values(field2) , field3 = values(field3) , field4 = values(field4) , field5 = values(field5) , field6 = values(field6) , field7 = values(field7) , field8 = values(field8) , field9 = values(field9) , field10 = values(field10)
mapper.update:
update rmp.lmt_comp_info
cus_id = #{cusId},
cert_code = #{certCode},
cert_type = #{certType},
cus_name = #{cusName},
crd_cont_no = #{crdContNo},
crd_type = #{crdType},
amt = #{amt},
input_date = #{inputDate},
input_time = #{inputTime},
last_update_date = #{lastUpdateDate},
last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime},
input_id = #{inputId},
input_br_id = #{inputBrId},
lmt_status = #{lmtStatus},
field1 = #{field1},
field2 = #{field2},
field3 = #{field3},
field4 = #{field4},
field5 = #{field5},
field6 = #{field6},
field7 = #{field7},
field8 = #{field8},
field9 = #{field9},
field10 = #{field10},
where lmt_comp_no = #{lmtCompNo}
